main event: An Air Force officer observed a bright light in the sky northeast of Buckley Air Force Base, Colorado on July 29, 1964.
interesting points: The object was first sighted as a bright light in the northeast sky,The light was stationary initially before moving slowly in a northeasterly direction,The light was visible for approximately 10-15 minutes before disappearing,The object appeared larger than a star and brighter than any other object in the sky,No sound was associated with the UFO and the weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
